Joseph Haydn

Eighteen Menuets, Hob. IX:20

?

Total duration: 23'

  • 1. D major
  • 2. G major
  • 3. B-flat major
  • 4. G major
  • 5. E major
  • 6. C major
  • 7. A major
  • 8. F major
  • 9. D major
  • 10. C major
  • 11. A major
  • 12. E major
  • 13. A major
  • 14. F major
  • 15. D major
  • 16. G major
  • 17. C major
  • 18. D major

These are probably piano versions of lost orchestral dances. The arrangements are probably spurious.

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · V · HN 5222 · Tänze und Märsche · ed. Günter Thomas
  • Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · V · HN 5221 · Tänze und Märsche · ed. Günter Thomas
  • Könemann · K 219 · Klavierstücke II · ed. Miklós Dolinszky

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1.5

2. G major

A version of this menuet is also used as the tenth of the twelve menuets (Hob. IX:3).
